com.epsi.edc1.library.impl

Class Book

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epsi.edc1.library.impl.Book

  • public class Book
extends java.lang.Object
    Book class object. For book management and creation.
    Author:
    Adrian Gandon, Alexis Dubus

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Book()
      Allow to create a book class object with all attributes set as null.
      Book(java.lang.String theISBN, java.lang.String author, java.lang.String title, boolean isPresent, java.lang.String id)
      Allow you to build a book object.

      • Book

        public Book(java.lang.String theISBN,
            java.lang.String author,
            java.lang.String title,
            boolean isPresent,
            java.lang.String id)
        Allow you to build a book object.
        Parameters:
        theISBN - The ISBN value of the book. This is a string.
        author - The author of that book. This is a string.
        title - The title of that book. This is a string.
        isPresent - True if this book is present in the library, false in other case. This is a boolean.
